"UbisoftGameLauncher.exe - Entry Point Not Found

The procedure entry point ?StartSavegameSync@Proxy@orbitdll@mg@@QAEXIW4TestMode@SavegameStorage@23@PAVITestStatusCallback@523@@Z could not be located in the dynamic link library ubiorbitapi_r2.dll"

Okay, so I've gotten past that error I just posted. It appears like this should work, but the maps aren't appearing ingame. I think the problem is the crack I'm using (SKIDROW) has an .ini file that contains my login information for Ubisoft's thing, which isn't letting it use my real account for some reason.
